name: Norman and billy the robot
description:
this is the re-uploaded version of the game, the first one had a problem with the download file

In this game you will have to follow your robot partner until he finds a robber.

Robbers can be in cars,bins,builnds...

Each Robber has 4 lives and you have to kill him before he escapes.

Remember to not to go to far away from your partner when he's searching for robbers otherwise you way lose him...

Sometimes the robot can be a bit buggy, just go near him and hopefully he will fix himself.

When the robot screams "Enemy Detected" and his eyes turn red you better follow him if you want to kill the robber.

Robbers can't be found without the help of your partner.

WASD or arrow keys to move,  right mouse button to aim left mouse button to shoot.

This game was made for the WOWIE GAME JAM 4.0.

It's my first game hope you like it.
